Certificate Generator & Email Sender

About Vertex Mail Gen

Welcome to Vertex Mail Gen! Our platform seamlessly generates custom certificates and sends them via email. Enjoy our modern, neon-styled interface packed with innovative features that make certificate handling a breeze.

Dive into our robust system, designed for ease-of-use, creative design, and top-notch performance. Experience the fusion of technology and style in every detail.

Our Features

  • Dynamic certificate preview with real-time positioning
  • Flexible template support & sleek UI design
  • Responsive forms with modern animations and neon effects
  • Automated email delivery for seamless certificate dispatch
); } export default App;
